description: Variation of condition 1 of  planning permission dated 21 April 2020 (RN: 19/07998/FULL) as amended by Non-Material Amendment dated 3 January 2024 (RN: 23/08172/NMA) for 'Demolition of the existing building and erection of a new building providing a retail unit (Class A1 Use) and six residential flats (Class C3 Use), including associated plant equipment, roof terraces at sixth and seventh floor levels and PV panels at roof level'. NAMELY, rearrangement of internal layout, omission of the basement, introduction of private residential balconies, changes to the facade and amendments to materiality of top floor termination.
